certifications.description: A three-month certification program on Programming in Java through NPTEL, instructed by a professor from IIT Kharagpur.

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

projects.name: Student Management System
projects.description: The Student Management System is a web application that utilizes Spring Boot and JSP to streamline CRUD operations for student data integrated with PostgreSQL database and employed Toastr for enhanced user interaction.

projects.name: Group Chat Application
projects.description: The Chat Application enables multiple users to chat with each other in a particular chatgroup, utilizing WebSocket technology and Spring Boot framework.

projects.name: Shivam GPT
projects.description: Web application that integrates OpenAI's API using Java and the Spring Boot to create an AI-powered chatbot. Designed a user-friendly interface with HTML, CSS and used JavaScript for API integration.

experiences.description: Worked upon development of critical functionalities within a project of a governmental entity, overseeing the entire lifecycle from implementation to maintenance. Leveraged Spring Boot for backend development and JSP for frontend functionalities. Developed features enabling project proponents and administrators to block, accept, or track project approval status through various stages, distributed across four distinct dashboards for different hierarchical approvals.
